funding-source.institution: Division of Plant Industry, Florida Department of Agriculture

funding-group.funding-statement: The research of DFG, REC, PCG, WAM, FSR, SG, JH, BLM, LLV, and DCA was supported by the USDA-APHIS Farm Bill Section 10007 project "Potential tree pest invasions from Cuba: Pest diversity, economic assessment of threat, and Cuban policy analysis" (award number AP17PPQS&T00C044), and by the Florida Department of Agriculture, Division of Plant Industry.
